net.spacive.apps.ejazdybackend.service

Class UserService

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.spacive.apps.ejazdybackend.service.UserService

  • @Service
public class UserService
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is an implementation of user service responsible for user handling.

    It is use case specific for driving school. It manipulates two types of users - instructors and students.
